page.title: 16Supernatural: Rosneath
page.content: In Clachan Road there used to be a mansion called Clachan House which was said to be haunted by 'The White Lady'. Two elderly caretakers claimed that their bed clothes were being pulled off and they were finally forced to move away. The White Lady is said to have had an affair and her enraged husband stabbed her lover and then killed her before disappearing himself. She is supposed to have been searching for both men. The house was eventually burnt down but the story lives on. Another story has it that the mansion was connected to the vaults of the church by an underground passage, the entrance to which was sealed off years ago. There is the grave of a freed black slave in the churchyard and some people fancy they have seen his ghost.
